webwork-tex.statement: Consider the vector field \(\mathbf{F} \left( x, y, z \right) = \left( 5 z+ 5 y\right) \mathbf{i} + \left( 5 z+ 5 x \right) \mathbf{j} + \left( 5 y+ 5 x \right) \mathbf{k}\). \par a) Find a function \(f\) such that \(\mathbf{F} = \nabla f\) and \(f(0,0,0) = 0\). \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y,z) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \par b) Suppose C is any curve from \(\left( 0, 0, 0 \right)\) to \(\left( 1, 1, 1 \right).\) Use part a) to compute the line integral \(\int_{C} \mathbf{F} \cdot d\mathbf{r}\). \leavevmode\\\relax \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
